label: Smart Exit Option
text: Access the Smart Exit Benefit°, reclaiming your premiums. This option is available from the 26th policy year onward, excluding the last 5 policy years, applicable when the life assured is aged 60 or above. No extra premium is required for this choice.

label: Terminal Illness Benefits
text: In case of the policyholder being diagnosed with a terminal illness, the entire death benefit is disbursed. This inherent benefit is included in the term insurance policy without any additional charges.

label: Boost your coverage with RIDERs
text:
- Accidental Death Benefit - In case of death due to an accident, Sum assured chosen as accidental death benefit is payable
- Accident Total Permanent Disability Benefits
 - In case of occurrence of total permanent disability of the life assured due to an accident, sum assured chosen ATPDB is payable
- Critical Illness Benefit
 – Upto 55 Critical Illness are covered
- Waiver Of Premium – Life cover continues without paying any premium on disability
- Terminal Illness Benefit - Death Benefit paid upon earlier of Diagnosis of Terminal Illness

label: Limited Premium Payment
text: Choose from flexible premium payment options that allow you to pay for a limited term while ensuring continuous coverage throughout the entire policy term.
